spell_tooltip.description:
Your Shout abilities have additional effects.
 Battle Shout:
Increases Stamina by 3%.
 Piercing Howl:
Radius increased by 50%
 Berserker Shout:
Range increased by 8 yds.
 Intimidating Shout:
Cooldown reduced by 15 sec.
 Rallying Cry:
Removes movement impairing effects and grants 30% movement speed to allies.
 Thunderous Roar:
Targets receive 5% more damage from all sources while bleeding.

Spell Reflection reflects the next 2 incoming spells cast on you and reflected spells deal 100% extra damage to the attacker.

Spell Reflection's cooldown is increased by 10 sec.
Bladestorm, Ravager, and Demolish  now snare all targets you hit by 60% for 6 sec and decrease their healing taken by 50% for 10 sec.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 50% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 152,833 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 61,701 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 75,617 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Revenge has a 20% chance to immediately refund 50% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 181,393 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Rage.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 79,142 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding two-handed weapons your damage is increased by 6% and damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 4%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 460,163 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 680,984 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.

Activating Avatar grants 6 sec of Recklessness.

The additional Rage generation of this Recklessness is reduced to 25%.
A vicious strike that deals 1.4 million Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.
Overpower the enemy, dealing 772,726 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
You are healed for 110% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Execute cost no Rage, be usable on any target regardless of their health, and deal damage as if you spent 40 Rage.
If Cleave or Whirlwind hits 2 or more targets you also Slam your primary target.
You have a 1.0% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 802,837 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10%.

Wounds the target, causing 328,014 Physical damage instantly and an additional 414,287 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to instantly reset their own cooldowns.
When Sweeping Strikes ends, your next Cleave or Whirlwind deals 25% increased damage for each ability used during Sweeping Strikes that damaged a second target.
Strikes all enemies in front of you for 577,073 Physical damage, inflicting Deep Wounds. Cleave will consume your Overpower effect to deal increased damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Overpower causes a seismic wave, dealing 129,517 damage to all enemies in a 10 yd line. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Colossus Smash increases your Haste by 10%, or by 20% if the target is below 35% health. Lasts for the duration of Colossus Smash.
Smash the ground and shatter the armor of all enemies within 10 yds, dealing 791,597 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Execute is usable on targets below 35% health.
Mastery increased by 2% and Tactician's chance to trigger is increased by an additional 1.0%.
Increases Versatility by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Die by the Sword by 30.0 sec.
Overpower has a 35% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike and generate 10 Rage.

Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last 6.0 sec longer and have a 5% increased critical strike chance.

If you have Rend, Mortal Strike inflicts Rend on targets below 35% health.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 3.3 million Physical damage over 5.1 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.
Your Mortal Strike, Cleave and Execute critical strike damage is increased by 10% and your Execute has a 5% increased critical hit chance.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Execute causes the target to take 35% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.

Your attacks against your primary target have a high chance to overwhelm their defenses and trigger a Slayer's Strike, dealing 866,581 damage and applying Marked for Execution, increasing the damage they take from your next Execute by 15%. Stacks 3 times.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your next Raging Blow deals 20% additional damage and 20% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 977,469 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Lasts until canceled.

The additional Rage generation of this Recklessness is reduced to 25%.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.
Thunder Clap roots all targets it damages for 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Demoralizing Shout by 15 sec, and Demoralizing Shout now reduces the damage enemies deal to all targets, not just you.

You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by 3% for 6 sec. Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional 3%, stacking up to 5 times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Lasts until canceled.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 155,178 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 62,479 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 76,303 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Revenge has a 20% chance to immediately refund 50% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 181,014 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Rage.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 77,633 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and Leech increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 466,604 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 680,984 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Avatar increases the damage of Thunder Clap and Shockwave by 50% and reduces the cooldown of Thunder Clap by 50%.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 1.7 million damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 5.5 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 270,307 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Demoralizes all enemies within 15 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 25% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 125,154 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Defensive Stance additionally reduces magic damage you take by 6%.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 104,252 Physical damage instantly and an additional 228,878 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.

Increases the radius of Demoralizing Shout by 5 yards.

Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 1.5 sec, up to 4.5 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
You gain 2% Haste for each enemy or ally within 10 yards, up to 8% Haste.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Shield Wall gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 1.3 million Physical damage to it and 424,176 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 1.6 million Physical damage to all enemies over 10.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Revenge, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing 282,819 Nature damage and generating 3 Rage.

Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%. 

Seismic Reverberations now affects Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 80,959 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Demoralizing Shout reduces damage enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals 40% increased damage as Stormstrike and generates 8 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

talent.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell_tooltip.description:
Physical damage taken reduced by 2%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by 8% for 5 sec.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Revenge and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 6 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 1.3 million Physical damage to it and 424,176 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 1.6 million Physical damage to all enemies over 10.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge critical strike chance and critical strike damage increased by 20% and Shield Charge increases your auto-attack damage and speed by 10% for 20 sec.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 155,586 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 61,762 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 74,684 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 3% and movement speed is increased by 2%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Roar explosively, dealing 466,585 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 680,984 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 1 million Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 1 million Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 1.5 million Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 320,029 health over 6 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 25% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 10% for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Execute is now usable on targets below 35% health and its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Haste increased by 2% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 2 Rage.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2% and Raging Blow's critical strikes deal 10% increased damage.

Brutally attack an enemy for 1 million Physical damage.

Generates 30 Rage.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 1.6 million Physical damage to all enemies over 10.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Onslaught Enrages you. If you have Slaughtering Strikes, it also grants you 3 stacks of Slaughtering Strikes.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Rampage has a 6% chance to grant Recklessness for 4 sec.
